gender_desc: After gender is selected, it can't be modified
add_language_desc: Adding the correct languages you speak can make the calls smoother. You can choose up to 3 languages.

if_reported_banned: If you are reported for the above behavior, you will be banned.
if_other_reported: Similarly, if the other party has the above behavior, you can also report it to us.

- Connect with expert tutors from around the world

got_gift_desc: has sent you a gift, you may loose it if you don't thank him/her

photo_req_1: You should be facing the camera
photo_req_3: Your face should be centered and upright

photo_req_6: Use a color photo with high resolution and no filters
complete_form_notice: Make sure to fill in all fields.

certificate_format: JPG or PNG format; maximum of 20MB
certification_placeholder: ex: IELTS/TOEFL or Chartered Financial Analyst or any other

diploma_placeholder: ex: Bachelor of Science or any other

start_date_must_be_earlier: The start date must be earlier than the end date

paiment_pending_desc: You need to pay the booking fees
complete_profile_desc: Complete your registration now and connect with thousands of learners around the world.
set_hour_rate_desc: Set your hourly rate and adjust it whenever you like. Typically, our tutors charge between $15 and $50 per hour.
teach_anywhere: Teach whenever and wherever you want
teach_anywhere_desc: Decide how much you want to work, with no minimum time requirements or set schedule. Enjoy the freedom of being your own boss!

subject_question: Which field do you offer services/tutorials in?

write_catchy_headline_desc: Your headline is crucial. Make it attention-grabbing, and encourage students to read your full profile.
write_catchy_headline_ph: Certified tutor with over five years of experience
writing_help_desc: Get an auto generated message based on your information in just a few seconds!
text_warning: Do not include any information about a discount, or any of your personal contact details
video_introduction: Add a landscape video of up to 2 minutes
video_introduction_desc: Introduce yourself to students in the language you used for your written description.
video_requirement_desc: Make sure your video meets the requirements to get approved
vid_req1: your video should be between 30 seconds and 2 minutes long
vid_req2: Video should recorded in landscape mode and eye level
vid_req3: Use good lighting and a neutral background
vid_req4: Use a stable surface so that your video does not appear shaky
vid_req5: Make sure your face and eyes are fully visible (except for religious reasons)
vid_req6: Highlight your teaching experience and any relevant teaching certification(s)
vid_req7: Greet your students warmly and invite them to book a lesson
vid_dont1: Include your surname or any contact details

add_thumbnail_warn: Do not include your surname, contact info, pricing or discounts, and irrelevant pictures in your thumbnail.
video_landscape_err: Make sure your video is in landscape and is between 30 seconds to 2 minutes
set_availability_desc: Availability shows your potential working hours. Students can book lessons at these times.
coin_to_usd: A coin is equivalent to 1 USD
can_change_after: Change your base rate in settings after approval
our_commission_desc: We use the funds for getting more students and for constant improvements of our learning platform
our_commission1: For every trial lesson with a new student Preply‚Äôs commission is 100%
our_commission2: For all the subsequent lessons, Preply charges a percentage (18%-33%) of the hourly rate
our_commission3: The more hours you teach, the lower your rate of commission will be
recurrent_payment_students: Students can subscribe to monthly or yearly plans based on the frequency of lessons they‚Äôll take. Automatic recurring payment takes place at the end of each month
